mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS id, r.spot_id AS spotId, r.user_id AS userId, u.name AS userName, r.rating AS rating, r.review_text AS reviewText, r.created_at AS createdAt FROM reviews r LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = r.user_id WHERE r.spot_id = #{spotId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
